original_text: Now Jeroboam had sent troops around to the rear, so that while he was in front of Judah the ambush was behind them.
korean_text: 여로보암이 유다의 뒤를 둘러 복병하였으므로 그 앞에는 이스라엘 사람들이 있고 그 뒤에는 복병이 있는지라

sentences.original_text: Now Jeroboam had sent troops around to the rear
so that while he was in front of Judah
